summary: Two young women must come to terms with the fact that a man they're deeply linked to is a murdering rapist.
cast: Saeda Kawaguchi|Akiko Koyama|Kei Satô|Rokkô Toura|Fumio Watanabe|Taiji Tonoyama|Teruko Kishi|Hôsei Komatsu|Hideo Kanze|Hideko Kawaguchi|Narumi Kayashima|Ryôko Takahara|Sen Yano
title: Violencia a pleno sol
